title: servers are lagging?
body:
Hello, is riot servers having an unresolved unannounced issues? cuz for me it sure does. sometimes i log into a game and the ping is normal for me (70) but sometimes its (200) and it's constant, it isn't lag spikes it just sits there for the entire game, and the next game it can go back to normal without any reason. no other applications are using the intenet are open, no one else uses the internet except me, and i checked with over 20 persons and they all confirmed it for me, it's like the instant i go into a game i joined a certain server which causes this lag and it remains untill the game ends and for even more conviction i checked other online games and they never lag(dota, csgo) i only play ranked games so i don't know about normal games server. so can you confirm or deny it any rioters out there please? :)

here is a screenshot of a custom game with the lag

https://ibb.co/ivn8xv

and 10 minutes later BOOM no lag

https://ibb.co/hdw1Hv

replies.body: I'm not even in NA nor playing on NA servers dude lol and i am sure it isn't my ISP i checked with multiple people with different ISPs.

Right now EUNE is not experiencing any known incidents; it's possible you may be experiencing ISP issues, but let's start from the bottom.

First, I always suggest players experiencing lag to try the steps in the [**Connection KB**](http://riot.com/12B7oac) for a start. Often just running through that can ID a cause for your lag and help you eliminate it. You can hit up our Tech Support team [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) too if you need an assist, or if you feel there's a problem not covered in the KB.

Next, I'd advise you to hit up your ISP and see if there are any current issues on their end, and ask if they route games differently. You can also check [**this handy list of peered providers**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004146508-EUW-EUNE-Peering-Partners-and-Internet-Exchange-Points-IXs-) and see if yours is on it or not; ultimately peered providers should have a more direct route and offer better speeds!
